text: 3.8 Kis 7.11, Lom 1.28, 2 Ko 13.5, 1 Ti 6.5, 2 Ti 2.25 Pen bɨ Janes ayɨp Jables ayɨp,3.8 Juda bɨ kɨli agelɨgɨpal, Yijip bɨnonɨm kɨli olap, ne bɨ chɨp sɨme sakep omɨŋal ak dek, kɨli bɨ omɨŋal bɨnonɨm wog ne gɨñelɨgɨpil agelɨgɨpal. Pen yɨb kɨli Janes ayɨp Jables ayɨp. Mosis Yijip owak ñɨn ak, bɨ omɨŋal anɨb ak yelek. Kisim Bek 7.22 ak, 9.11 ak nɨgɨnɨmɨn. kɨli Mosis takaw agak ak yɨlɨk nɨŋɨd mɨlɨk nɨgɨlek tek, bɨ apin anɨb okok takaw yɨpɨd gɨl mɨdeb ak anɨb ak nep gebal. Gos kɨli ak tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨl, sawl sek lek, Klays nop gos lɨnepal ak kelɨgɨpal.
